title: HVF AVNL Notification 2026 - Apply Offline for 220 Junior Technician Posts
description: The Heavy Vehicles Factory (HVF) AVNL has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 220 Junior Technician Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th can apply for the HVF AVNL Notification 2026 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary,...
